explainability.findings: The company documents its commitment to explainability through the establishment of an Artificial Intelligence Ethics Advisory Committee and the use of an AI Factory MLOps platform with model monitoring for traceability and reliability. It also references the adoption of DoD AI Ethical Principles to ensure repeatable processes that support explainability. Furthermore, the company acknowledges challenges related to lack of explainability and highlights investments in explainability companies.

relevant_sources.summary: This corporate capabilities help page, "Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning Capabilities," provides evidence for **governance**, **transparency**, and **explainability**. The document details the establishment of an Artificial Intelligence Ethics Advisory Committee, demonstrating a commitment to governance and explainability. Furthermore, it highlights the AI Factory MLOps platform with model monitoring for traceability and reliability, and the adoption of DoD AI Ethical Principles, which collectively support transparency and explainability by ensuring repeatable processes and adherence to ethical guidelines.
relevant_sources.title: Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning Capabilities

relevant_sources.summary: This technical paper provides evidence for **governance**, **transparency**, **fairness**, and **explainability**. The document details Lockheed Martin's "AI Factory" and "LAIC" initiatives, which establish structured processes for AI development, deployment, and adherence to DoD standards, demonstrating strong governance. Transparency is evident through the mention of specific AI tools like LMText Navigator and the use of LLMs, as well as the industrialization of AI development. The paper also acknowledges challenges like bias and lack of explainability, directly supporting the fairness and explainability pillars, and highlights investments in explainability companies as part of their governance strategy.
relevant_sources.title: Lockheed Martin's AI Strategy: Analysis of Dominance in Aerospace Defense

external_accountability.findings: The company documents its external accountability practices through the adoption of DoD Ethical AI Principles and a commitment to embedding ethical safeguards throughout the AI lifecycle. It also mentions a commitment to trustworthy AI model development and deployment. Furthermore, the company references compliance with executive orders for trustworthy AI and federal AI standards, and describes audit trails for chain of custody.
external_accountability.path_to_improvement: Publish third-party audit results, certifications, or regulatory compliance documentation.

relevant_sources.summary: This recruitment help page from Lockheed Martin AI Center provides evidence for **external_accountability, fairness, governance, and transparency**. The company highlights its adoption of DoD Ethical AI Principles and commitment to embedding ethical safeguards throughout the AI lifecycle, demonstrating a focus on governance and transparency in AI development and deployment. Furthermore, it mentions a commitment to trustworthy AI model development and deployment, implying a dedication to fairness and external accountability through ethical principles, frameworks, and certification.
relevant_sources.title: At the Forefront of AI Technology - Lockheed Martin AI Center

relevant_sources.summary: This technical paper, "Lockheed Martin AI Factory - NVIDIA Customer Story," provides evidence for **governance**, **transparency**, **privacy**, and **external accountability**. The document details an AI factory infrastructure that emphasizes structured AI development and deployment through MLOps platforms, codifying best practices, and centralizing tools. This approach supports governance and transparency by ensuring repeatable, automated capabilities and adherence to ethical principles. Furthermore, the paper highlights strict data governance with access controls and compliance with executive orders for trustworthy AI, directly supporting the privacy and external accountability pillars.
relevant_sources.title: Lockheed Martin AI Factory - NVIDIA Customer Story

relevant_sources.summary: This technical paper on Lockheed Martin's data versioning practices provides evidence for **governance**, **transparency**, **external_accountability**, and **privacy**. It details mechanisms for complete model lineage tracking, experiment reproducibility, and immutable versioning, which support **governance** and **transparency** by enabling traceability and validation. The paper also describes audit trails for chain of custody and compliance with federal AI standards, bolstering **external_accountability**, and mentions data isolation and retention policies, contributing to **privacy**.
relevant_sources.title: Data Versioning: Turning AI-ish Stacks into a Real AI Factory

fairness.findings: The company documents its commitment to fairness through AI ethics training for developers, which includes "equitable" principles and considerations. Published materials highlight a commitment to applying ethics and training to AI processes and to trustworthy AI model development. The company also acknowledges challenges like bias and mentions rules requiring the removal of conflicts of interest when using AI.

relevant_sources.summary: This policy document, "2025 Sustainability Management Plan and Goals," provides evidence for **governance**, **fairness**, and **privacy**. It supports governance by detailing the structure and operations of an AI Ethics Subcommittee and an AI Executive Steering Committee, including their meeting cadence and reporting mechanisms. The policy also demonstrates a commitment to fairness and privacy by mentioning the training of AI developers on ethical principles and referencing AI in the context of privacy and intellectual property.
relevant_sources.title: 2025 Sustainability Management Plan and Goals

relevant_sources.summary: The "2025 Definitive Proxy Statement" provides evidence for **governance, oversight, and transparency** in responsible AI. This board governance document details the AI Ethics Subcommittee's oversight structure, board-level engagement with AI governance and risk management, and quarterly reporting to leadership on AI ethics matters, demonstrating a commitment to structured AI deployment and review. The document also highlights the evaluation of AI as a risk focus area and mentions the demonstration of autonomous system capabilities, contributing to transparency.
relevant_sources.title: 2025 Definitive Proxy Statement

relevant_sources.summary: This SEC Form 10-K filing provides evidence for **governance, oversight, fairness, and transparency**. relevant_sources.summary: This audit report, "Cyber and AI Oversight Disclosures: What Companies Shared in 2025," provides evidence for **governance, oversight, transparency, and fairness**. The report highlights increased corporate disclosure of AI risk in board oversight and as a 10-K risk factor, demonstrating enhanced **governance** and **oversight** mechanisms. governance.findings: The company documents its AI governance through the establishment of Five Ethical AI Principles and mandates that AI procurement, development, and use align with company values, referencing a foundational policy (CPS-022) and an AI Ethics Advisory Committee. It details the structure and operations of an AI Ethics Subcommittee and an AI Executive Steering Committee, including their meeting cadence and reporting mechanisms, and describes board-level engagement with AI governance and risk management. Furthermore, the company highlights the adoption of DoD AI Ethical Principles, MLOps model governance, and a strategic focus on specific use cases and a framework for managing AI deployment.

relevant_sources.summary: This policy document, "Code of Ethics and Business Conduct (2025)," provides evidence for the **governance** pillar of responsible AI. summary.overall_findings: Lockheed Martin's published materials demonstrate operational practices for governance, including the establishment of Five Ethical AI Principles, and for fairness, with disclosures highlighting the development of AI ethics training that includes equitable principles. All 7 evaluated responsible AI pillars have documented public evidence, with transparency practices describing an AI Factory MLOps platform for model monitoring and traceability. Additionally, privacy and external accountability are addressed at the policy level, with privacy documentation mentioning AI in the context of privacy and intellectual property. This assessment draws on 24 publicly available sources.
